content.description: Climb the weakness and then traverse right, at the top, to a bolted anchor and chains.
content.protection: Gear, generally a good selection of small to medium pieces.
content.location: The route is a right trending weakness (ramp) with a crack for protection.  It faces the gully.  Rap the route.

content.description: Start in a shallow right facing dihedral, continue upward and later make a hard traverse to the left.  Some of the traverse moves are tricky but the climbing eases to a ledge and the anchor.
content.protection: Gear, a light rack with some alpine draws.
content.location: The route is a bit downhill of a prominent right facing dihedral.   Rap the route.  The route shares the anchor with Adeled Evangelical.

content.description: This small area is uphill and right of Catherdral Rock.  There is a large right facing dihedral on the right side of the area and some short cracks on the left side.
